title: UAE Gets 1st Licensed Lottery With Top Prize At...
content: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) has launched its first authorised national lottery, with a jackpot of 100 million dirhams (AED) -- equivalent to $27.2 million -- up for grabs.
summary: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) has launched its first authorised national lottery, with a jackpot of 100 million dirhams (AED) -- equivalent to $27.2 million -- up for grabs.

title: Bangladesh High Court Acquits Ex-PM Khaleda Zia In Corruption Case
content: Bangladesh High Court on Wednesday acquitted former prime minister and BNP Chairperson Khaleda Zia in a corruption case in which she was sentenced to seven years in jail by a lower court, according to media reports.
summary: Bangladesh High Court on Wednesday acquitted former prime minister and BNP Chairperson Khaleda Zia in a corruption case in which she was sentenced to seven years in jail by a lower court, according to media reports.

title: All About Bushra Bibi, Imran Khan's Wife And Central Figure In Pak Protests
content: Pakistan this week saw serious turmoil, with supporters of former Prime Minister Imran Khan defying government lockdowns and violent police opposition to demand the release of jailed Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) founder.

title: Trump Tariffs: Here's What Gets More Expensive For American Consumers

title: Meet Ananda Krishnan, Father Of Monk Son Who Gave Up $5 Billion Empire
content: Ananda Krishnan is one of Malaysia's most influential and wealthiest individuals. In the past week, Mr Krishnan, also known as AK, has been in the limelight because of his son Ajahn Siripanyo, who gave up the world's riches to become a Buddhist monk.

title: ISKCON A "Fundamentalist" Group: Bangladesh Government To Court
